title: The presence of spontaneous echo contrast didn't increase the risk for left atrial appendage closure: a propensity score matching analysis based on the CLACBAC study
content:
Publication date: Available online 22 August 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Jun Zhang, Lili Zhou, Zhongyuan Ren, Shiyu Feng, Jiayu Wu, Haotian Yang, Yixing Zheng, Weilun Meng, Yang Su, Jun Xu, Hui Sun, Yifan Zhao, Yun Xie, Yawei Xu, Dongdong Zhao
